chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: We then, as workers together with him, beseech you also that ye receive not the grace of God in vain.
items.plainText: We then, as workers together with him, beseech you also that ye receive not the grace of God in vain.

items.text: (For he saith, I have heard thee in a time accepted, and in the day of salvation have I succoured thee: behold, now is the accepted time; behold, now is the day of salvation.)
items.plainText: (For he saith, I have heard thee in a time accepted, and in the day of salvation have I succoured thee: behold, now is the accepted time; behold, now is the day of salvation.)

items.text: Giving no offence in any thing, that the ministry be not blamed:
items.plainText: Giving no offence in any thing, that the ministry be not blamed:

items.text: But in all things approving ourselves as the ministers of God, in much patience, in afflictions, in necessities, in distresses,
items.plainText: But in all things approving ourselves as the ministers of God, in much patience, in afflictions, in necessities, in distresses,

items.text: In stripes, in imprisonments, in tumults, in labours, in watchings, in fastings;
items.plainText: In stripes, in imprisonments, in tumults, in labours, in watchings, in fastings;

items.text: By pureness, by knowledge, by longsuffering, by kindness, by the Holy Ghost, by love unfeigned,
items.plainText: By pureness, by knowledge, by longsuffering, by kindness, by the Holy Ghost, by love unfeigned,

items.text: By the word of truth, by the power of God, by the armour of righteousness on the right hand and on the left,
items.plainText: By the word of truth, by the power of God, by the armour of righteousness on the right hand and on the left,

items.text: By honour and dishonour, by evil report and good report: as deceivers, and yet true;
items.plainText: By honour and dishonour, by evil report and good report: as deceivers, and yet true;

items.text: As unknown, and yet well known; as dying, and, behold, we live; as chastened, and not killed;
items.plainText: As unknown, and yet well known; as dying, and, behold, we live; as chastened, and not killed;

items.text: As sorrowful, yet alway rejoicing; as poor, yet making many rich; as having nothing, and yet possessing all things.
items.plainText: As sorrowful, yet alway rejoicing; as poor, yet making many rich; as having nothing, and yet possessing all things.

items.text: O ye Corinthians, our mouth is open unto you, our heart is enlarged.
items.plainText: O ye Corinthians, our mouth is open unto you, our heart is enlarged.

items.text: Ye are not straitened in us, but ye are straitened in your own bowels.
items.plainText: Ye are not straitened in us, but ye are straitened in your own bowels.

items.text: Now for a recompence in the same, (I speak as unto my children,) be ye also enlarged.
items.plainText: Now for a recompence in the same, (I speak as unto my children,) be ye also enlarged.

items.text: Be ye not unequally yoked together with unbelievers: for what fellowship hath righteousness with unrighteousness? and what communion hath light with darkness?
items.plainText: Be ye not unequally yoked together with unbelievers: for what fellowship hath righteousness with unrighteousness? and what communion hath light with darkness?

items.text: And what concord hath Christ with Belial? or what part hath he that believeth with an infidel?
items.plainText: And what concord hath Christ with Belial? or what part hath he that believeth with an infidel?

items.text: And what agreement hath the temple of God with idols? for ye are the temple of the living God; as God hath said, I will dwell in them, and walk in them; and I will be their God, and they shall be my people.
items.plainText: And what agreement hath the temple of God with idols? for ye are the temple of the living God; as God hath said, I will dwell in them, and walk in them; and I will be their God, and they shall be my people.

items.text: Wherefore come out from among them, and be ye separate, saith the Lord, and touch not the unclean thing; and I will receive you,
items.plainText: Wherefore come out from among them, and be ye separate, saith the Lord, and touch not the unclean thing; and I will receive you,

items.text: And will be a Father unto you, and ye shall be my sons and daughters, saith the Lord Almighty.
items.plainText: And will be a Father unto you, and ye shall be my sons and daughters, saith the Lord Almighty.
